errors.noArgs: You need to provide something to search for or a URL.
errors.noChannel: You must be in a voice channel.
errors.maxSongs: You have reached the maximium queue limit of `{max}`. You can raise this limit by purchasing Arcane Premium. <https://arcane.bot/premium>
errors.maxSongsPlaylist: Added `{added}` songs to the queue. You have reached the maximium queue limit of `{max}`. You can raise this limit by purchasing Arcane Premium. <https://arcane.bot/premium>

play.noMoreSongs: There are no more songs in the queue!

skip.alreadyVoted: You have already voted to skip the song.
skip.noVotes: There are not enough votes to skip the song. {amount} out of {required} have voted.

pause.alreadyPaused: The music is already paused. Run `{prefix}resume` to continue the music.

resume.alreadyPlaying: The music is already playing. Run `{prefix}pause` to pause the music.

seek.noArgs: You need to provide a time to seek to.

volume.noArgs: You need to provide a volume.
volume.notDonor: This server does not have premium features enabled. The max volume non-donators can have is 150. Learn more at <https://arcane.bot/premium>

stop.stoppingPlayer: **Stopping the music and leaving the channel.**

stats.errorFetchingStats: There was an error fetching stats. Try again in a few minutes.

errors.noRank: You have no rank. Keep chatting to earn a rank!

voteBooster.noVoteImage: Vote Booster: Vote now for a 10% boost. <{url}>

color.invalidColor: You need to provide a valid color or hex code.
color.invalidImage: You need to provide a direct link to the image.
color.invalidOpacity: You need to provide a valid opacity. 0.1-1 EX: `.5`
color.confirmChange: Are you sure you want to change your color?
color.notPremium: Background colors, transparency, and images require you to be premium. Learn more at https://arcane.bot/premium.

errors.noUser: You need to provide a user to levelup.
errors.noBots: You cannot set a bots level.
errors.maxLevel: You cannot set the level higher than 100. (Users can earn above level 100 though)

errors.noUsesr: You need to provide a user to levelup.
errors.noBots: You cannot set a bots level.

confirm.resetEveryone: Are you sure you want to reset everyone's level in {guild}? This action is irreversible.
confirm.resetLeft: Are you sure you want to reset everyone who has left? This action is irreversible.
confirm.resetUser: Are you sure you want to reset {user}'s level? This action is irreversible.

errors.invalidAmount: You need to provide how many messages to purge.
errors.noUser: You need to provide a valid user.
errors.noContain: You need to provide a word or phrase to filter by.

errors.noUser: You need to provide a user to ban.
errors.cantBan: I am not able to ban {user}.

errors.invalidTime: {input} is an invalid time! Slowmode can only go up to 6 hours.
errors.cantEdit: I am not able to edit <#{channel}>'s slowmode.

errors.cantLock: I am not able to lock <#{channel}>.

errors.cantUnlock: I am not able to unlock <#{channel}>.

errors.noUser: You need to provide a user to kick.
errors.cantKick: I am not able to kick {user}.

errors.noUser: You need to provide a user to mute.
errors.cantMute: I am not able to mute {user}.

errors.noUser: You need to provide a user to unmute.
errors.cantUnmute: I am not able to unmute {user}.

errors.noUser: You need to provide a user to warn.
errors.cantWarn: I am not able to warn {user}.
errors.noReason: You need to provide a reason.
errors.failedDM: ⚠️ I was unable to DM `{user}`. They may of not recieved the warning but I have added it to their history.

errors.noUser: You need to provide a user for me to lookup history on.
errors.noCase: No valid case or user provided

history.specificCase:
Moderator: `{moderator}`
Reason: {reason}

Revoke the case: `{prefix}history {case} revoke`
Update the case: `{prefix}case {case} New Reason`

errors.noUser: You need to provide a user to temp ban.
errors.cantBan: I am not able to temp ban {user}.
errors.noTime: You need to provide how long to temp ban.

reason.noCase: You need to provide a case to update.
reason.noCaseFound: I can't find a case when searching for: `#{case}`
reason.noReason: You need to provide a new reason.

redeem.notSupportServer: This command can only be used in the official support server. https://discord.gg/arcane
redeem.notEligible:
You must purchase perks on our Patreon (https://patreon.com/arcanebot) to use this command.

↳ If you have purchased a tier make sure to verify you have linked your discord account to patreon.
↳ If you can't get this set up please DM `ImDarkDiamond#0256`

redeemed.tier1: Thank you for purchasing `Tier 1`. Your perks will remain until you stop paying for Tier 1. You can enable the perks on **2** discord servers.
redeemed.tier12: Thank you for purchasing `Tier 2`. Your perks will remain until you stop paying for Tier 2. You can enable the perks on **5** discord servers.
redeemed.tier3: Thank you for purchasing `Tier 3`. Your perks will remain until you stop paying for Tier 3. You can enable the perks on **15** discord servers.

automod.currentConfig:
Spam: `{spam}`
Invite: `{invite}`
Phrase: `{phrase}`
Profanity: `{profanity}`
Raid: `{raid}`

Logs: {logs}
automod.invalidOption: You need to provide a valid setting to edit. `spam, invite, phrase, profanity, raid, or logs`

spam.invalidArg: Spam can be `true or false`. Example: `{prefix}automod spam true`.

invite.invalidArg: Invites can be `true or false`. Example: `{prefix}automod invite true`.

phrase.invalidArg: Phrase can be `true or false`. Example: `{prefix}automod phrase true`.

vote: You can vote for Arcane by visiting <https://arcane.bot/vote>. Thank you!
support: You can get help with Arcane by joining our support server. https://discord.gg/arcane

help.moreHelp: Here is a list of all my commands. You can edit {guild}'s settings here. If you need support you can join our [discord](https://discord.gg/arcane).

invite: You can invite Arcane by visiting <https://arcane.bot/invite>.

selfrole.selfroles:
Here are all the self-roles for **{guild}**:
{roles}
selfrole.noRoles: No selfroles have been setup in {guild}

create.ticketAlreadyCreated: You already have a ticket. View it here: <#{channel}>
create.createdTicket: Created a ticket! View your ticket here: <#{channel}>
create.createdPing:
Support will be in touch with you as soon as possible. In the meantime tell us about your issue!

You can close the ticket anytime by running `{prefix}close`

close.tickedClosedDM: Your ticket has been closed. You can view the transcript here:

suggest.missingSuggestion: You need to provide a suggestion.

accept.missingSuggestion: You need to provide a suggestion ID to approve it.

deny.missingSuggestion: You need to provide a suggestion ID to deny it.

consider.missingSuggestion: You need to provide a suggestion ID to consider it.

remind.noTime: You need to provide how long I should remind you in.
remind.reminderSet: I will remind you in {duration}. ID: {id}

repeat.invalidTime: You need to provide a valid time. Repeat reminders can only repeat every 24 hours or more. Example: `2d, in 2 days, in 3 weeks, 3w`

delete.invalidReminder: You need to provide a valid reminder.

embed.noJSON: You need to provide valid JSON for me to send. <https://embed.discord.website/>
embed.noMessageID: You need to provide the mesasge id of the embed in this channel.
embed.cantFindMessage: I cannot find the message `{id}`. Make sure you run the command in the channel the embed was posted in.
embed.notMyMessage: I cannot edit the message. I can only edit my messages.

reactionrole.invalidChannel: You need to provide a valid channel
reactionrole.invalidEmojiSelected: {emoji} is already an emoji on the message you provided.
reactionrole.promptReaction: React to this message with the reaction you want to use for the reaction role.
reactionrole.invalidEmoji: Arcane only supports normal emojis. Custom emojis do not work yet. They will come in a few weeks. You can continue to react to the above message to continue.
reactionrole.timedOut: Reaction role setup has been canceled. You took too long to choose a valid reaction.
reactionrole.attemptingCreation: {emoji} will be used as the emoji for the reaction role. Give me a moment while I set everything up.

type.noType: You need to provide a reaction role type.
type.noTypeExamples:
1. React to get a role and unreact to remove the role.
2. React to add or remove the role. Your reaction will always be removed.
3. Group locking. You can only have one reaction role from the message.
 ↳ **This will change all reaction roles on the message to be group locked.**
4. Persistent roles. React to add the role. Unreacting will not remove the role.
type.noID: You need to provide a reaction role ID. The ID is given when they are completely setup or in the `{prefix}list` command.
type.invalidID: You need to provide a valid reaction role ID.
type.changingMultiple: Changing multiple (group locked) reaction roles to `{type}`.

list.removeReactionRole: To remove a reaction role use the `{prefix}remove` command. Example: `{prefix}remove abc123`.

remove.noID: You need to provide a reaction role ID. The ID is given when they are completely setup or in the `{prefix}list` command.
remove.invalidID: You need to provide a valid reaction role ID.
remove.removedReactionRole: Removed the reaction role from the message. You will need to remove my reaction manually.

disable.alreadyDisabled: You need to provide a valid command which isn't already disabled.
disable.disabled: Disabled `{command}` for everyone in the server.

enable.alreadyEnabled: You need to provide a valid command which isn't already enabled.
enable.enabled: Enabled `{command}` for everyone in the server.
